channel.title: Attack style[delta]
channel.description:
hello moparscapers,
i just got the 2speced source maded by marcobob. But now i have a problem. When i'm unarmed and i use punch it will give me str exp. When i do kick it gives me def xp and when i do block it gives me attack xp. Anyone know how to fix this? I'm using a delta based source.
halflive9

item.title: Attack style[delta]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“baddy351, post:2, topic:399979”]Well, is that server a delta? I think probably client.java or something, look for the code[/quote]yes it is. Well i think it’s in clickingmost.java but i’m not sure what to change there.

Read full topic
